creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: Art Deco style; nude woman with very long stylized flowing hair seated inside a ring floating in space at left, looking down at a figure in water, clutching a tree trunk at right; starry sky; skull with snake in LLC; mounted to brown paper; probably a reproduction
medium: Reproduction (?) of pen and ink drawing
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: Untitled [Art Deco image of figure in sky and figure in water in a landscape]
